Description: I Have a Gibson Les Paul Traditional PRO in Vintage Sunburst for sell. I purchased the guitar awhile back but really haven’t played it much and unfortunately it has been sitting in the closet for most of its life. I would say it is a closet clean guitar that has seen less then 50 hours of play time. It has some small finish flaws but nothing the camera will pick up..the only thing I have seen is the tone knobs have cracks in them? Not sure how it happen but functions like it should with no issues. The only reason I’m selling it is because I have been getting into more Acoustic guitars, so I am selling most of my electric Guitars and amps. If you have any questions please ask! It comes with the following listed below. Shipping will be $50 in the lower 48 USA!! The Guitar will be Doubled boxed. The GuitarCaseOwner ManualWarranty Card Serial Number CardDunlop Strap Locks (installed) Dunlop Strap (BMF Leather) THIS IS A USA SALE ONLY! I WILL NOT SHIP OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA!
